skills.name: Calculate missing widths, heights or frequencies without the histogram

explanations.A: This is the upper bound, but how wide would the bar be if it started at 80 and went to 120?
explanations.B: I think you have added the upper and lower bound. To find the width we need the difference between them, what operation would we use?
explanations.D: This is the midpoint, but how wide would the bar be if it started at 80 and went to 120?

explanations.A: To find the frequency density, we divide the frequency by the group width. This means that the star is 34.

explanations.D: I think you have stated the class width. To find the frequency density, we divide the frequency by the group width.

explanations.A: I think you may have made an arithmetic error. Check your calculation.
explanations.B: I think you have divided them the wrong way around. To find the frequency density, we divide the frequency by the group width.
explanations.C: I think you may have converted 1/5 to 0.5. Check your calculation.
explanations.D: To find the frequency density, we divide the frequency by the group width. This means that the frequency density is 16 ÷ 80 = 2 ÷ 10 = 0.2..

explanations.A: I think you may have made an arithmetic error. Check your calculation.
explanations.B: To find the frequency density, we divide the frequency by the group width. This means that the frequency density is 12 ÷ 40 = 3 ÷ 10 = 0.3
explanations.C: I think you have divided them the wrong way around. To find the frequency density, we divide the frequency by the group width.
explanations.D: I think you may have made an arithmetic error. Check your calculation.

explanations.A: I think you are trying to plot the group width of 40. Consider the shape of a histogram and the lower and upper bound for this class width.
explanations.B: I think you may have mixed up the axes. On a histogram, the variable is plotted on the x axis, and the frequency density is plotted on the y axis.
explanations.C: We plot the lower and upper bound of the group on the x axis, so we would draw a bar from 80 to 120.
explanations.D: I think you have stated the frequency. We plot the variable on the x axis in histograms.

explanations.A: I think you are trying to plot the group width of 60. Consider the shape of a histogram and the lower and upper bound for this class width.
explanations.B: I think you have stated the frequency. We plot the variable on the x axis in histograms.
explanations.C: I think you may have mixed up the axes. On a histogram, the variable is plotted on the x axis, and the frequency density is plotted on the y axis.
explanations.D: We plot the lower and upper bound of the group on the x axis, so we would draw a bar from 60 to 120.
